list.head: Contact Information:

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
did.physdesc: 1 box, 0.4 cu. ft., three small notebooks.
did.origination: Received in September, 1955 from the Chemistry Department Library of Virginia Polytechnic Institute.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Robert E. Hussey Notebooks must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Hussey, Robert E. Notebooks, 1928-37, n.d., Ms55-004, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Dr. Robert E. Hussey was a professor in chemistry at Virginia Polytechnic Institute from 1925 to 1952, becoming Emeritus Professor of Organic Chemistry in 1960.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The Robert E. Hussey Notebooks contain three research report notebooks which includes chemistry notes with papers and samples interleafed between the pages.
